title: Blended Learning Workshop Utilizing Food Composition Data

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course based on FAO/INFOODS educational materials, combining blended learning with online lectures and offline project work

learning_goals: Learners can explain the procedures for collecting, processing, and managing food composition databases.
Students can prepare food component analysis reports in accordance with international standards.
Students can complete data quality assessment projects through real-world case studies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
